thread.title: Talks on climate deal heat up over bill for global warming
thread.title_full: Talks on climate deal heat up over bill for global warming

author: KARL RITTER
title: Talks on climate deal heat up over bill for global warming
text:
Talks on climate deal heat up over bill for global warming   
BONN, Germany (AP) — The trillion-dollar question of who should pay for global warming is coming to a head in talks on an international climate pact, as developing countries worry they won't get enough money to tackle the problem. 
With just five weeks left before a U.N. climate summit in Paris, developing countries closed ranks at weeklong talks ending Friday in Bonn and called on wealthy nations to make firm financial commitments to help them fight and adapt to climate change. kAm%96 !2C:D DF>>:E QH:== 36 ;F5865 3J H92E :D 4@?E2:?65 :?
